headline: ArcBest taps CH Robinson veteran to fix asset-light business
summary: ArcBest announced it has hired former C.H. Robinson brokerage President Mac Pinkerton to lead operations at its asset-light logistics segment. The post ArcBest taps CH Robinson veteran to fix asset-light business appeared first on FreightWaves.

headline: C.H. Robinson Debuts Self-Serve Tariff Analysis Tool, Empowering Shippers to Manage Costs and Navigate Market Volatility
summary: EDEN PRAIRIE, Minn., May 29, 2025--C.H. ROBINSON DEBUTS SELF-SERVE TARIFF ANALYSIS TOOL, EMPOWERING SHIPPERS TO MANAGE COSTS AND NAVIGATE MARKET VOLATILITY

headline: C.H. Robinson Debuts Self-Serve Tariff Analysis Tool
summary: C.H. Robinson announced its new U.S. Tariff Impact Analysis tool to address the increasing needs of shippers navigating tariffs. Built for today's shifting trade environment, this customer-centric...
